title: Updating risk remediation-endpoints for petroleum-contaminated soils? A case study in the Ecuadorian Amazon Region

Author(s): Daniel Hidalgo-Lasso, Karina García-Villacís, Jeaneth Urvina Ulloa, Darwin Marín Tapia, Patricio Gómez Ortega, Frederic Coulon
